cakes.name: Red Velvet Cake
cakes.description: A classic cake with a rich, velvety texture and a touch of cocoa powder.

cakes.name: Chocolate Fudge Cake
cakes.description: A decadent chocolate cake with a dense, fudgy texture and rich chocolate flavor.

cakes.name: Strawberry Shortcake
cakes.description: A light and fluffy vanilla cake layered with fresh strawberries and whipped cream.

cakes.name: Lemon Poppy Seed Cake
cakes.description: A tangy lemon cake with a crunchy poppy seed topping and a sweet glaze.

cakes.name: Carrot Cake
cakes.description: A moist and flavorful cake made with fresh carrots, cinnamon, and nutmeg.

cakes.name: Tiramisu Cake
cakes.description: A rich and creamy cake with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

cakes.name: Black Forest Cake
cakes.description: A classic German cake made with layers of chocolate cake, cherry filling, and whipped cream.

cakes.name: Banana Bread Cake
cakes.description: A moist and delicious cake made with ripe bananas and warm spices like cinnamon and nutmeg.

cakes.name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
cakes.description: A classic cake made with juicy pineapple rings, maraschino cherries, and a buttery brown sugar topping.

cakes.name: Lemon Meringue Cake
cakes.description: Layers of lemon sponge cake filled with tangy lemon curd and topped with fluffy meringue frosting.

cakes.name: Dark Chocolate Cake
cakes.description: A rich and decadent cake made with dark chocolate and topped with ganache frosting.

cakes.name: Tiramisu Cake
cakes.description: Layers of espresso-soaked sponge cake and creamy mascarpone filling, topped with cocoa powder.

cakes.name: Matcha Cake
cakes.description: A light and fluffy cake made with Japanese green tea powder, topped with whipped cream and red bean paste.

cakes.name: Black Forest Cake
cakes.description: Layers of chocolate sponge cake filled with cherry compote and whipped cream, topped with chocolate shavings.

cakes.name: Banana Cake
cakes.description: A moist and flavorful cake made with ripe bananas, topped with cream cheese frosting and sliced bananas.

cakes.name: Coconut Cake
cakes.description: A tropical cake made with coconut milk and shredded coconut, topped with coconut cream cheese frosting.

cakes.name: Hummingbird Cake
cakes.description: A southern classic with layers of banana, pineapple, and pecans, topped with cream cheese frosting.

cakes.name: German Chocolate Cake
cakes.description: A rich and indulgent cake with layers of chocolate sponge cake, pecan-coconut frosting, and chocolate ganache.
